function.name: copynode
function.description: Copies the provided subnode to node parentnode, optionally at position beforenode. Returns the newly created node.

example.description: Given an XML-file note.xml, which contains:

examples.example: <note> <to>Tove</to> <from>Jani</from> <heading>Reminder</heading> <body>Don't forget me this weekend!</body> <body>Don't forget me this weekend!</body> </note>

example.description: Note: Never mind the indentation of <body>, this is a known issue. The second <from> and <body> are on the same level.
